title: Phase 0 - Telephony Skeleton
description:
No AI yet. Build core telephony infrastructure.

## Goals
- Inbound PSTN number reachable via Twilio
- Answer call, play static audio prompt
- Record caller audio to storage
- Save minimal call metadata to DB
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Twilio webhook receives inbound calls
- [ ] Call answered within 2 rings
- [ ] Static audio prompt plays successfully (English + Spanish)
- [ ] Call metadata persisted to Postgres (from_number, timestamp, duration)
- [ ] Audio recording saved to cloud storage
- [ ] Unit tests pass for telephony adapter (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test: place real call â†’ verify DB record created
- [ ] Docker compose brings up all services without error

title: Epic: Skills Migration for VozBot
description: Migrate and refactor 14 skills from entropy-wiki project to be VozBot-focused. Involves deletions, consolidation, renaming, and content updates.

title: Delete unnecessary skills (wiki-ingest, reference-context, bead-workflow, task-intake)
description:
Delete 4 skill directories:
- .claude/skills/wiki-ingest/ - User requested removal
- .claude/skills/reference-context/ - References non-existent docs directories  
- .claude/skills/bead-workflow/ - Duplicates beads plugin (already auto-loaded)
- .claude/skills/task-intake/ - Being merged into vozbot-project-workflow
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] 4 skill directories deleted
- [ ] No broken references in remaining skills
